CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 11, 1957, pg. A12, reads: "STUNNING...FABULOUS...FASCINATING were just some of the adjectives used in connection with the annual Fashion Show given at Schenley High School by the Beauty Shop Owners and Beauticians. Left to right: Pittsburgh's scintillating Ethel Littlejohn, one of the town's best dressed girls, showed and all-gold evening coat topping a short white satin gown crusted with gold embroidery."
TitMainTitle: Ethel Littlejohn wearing gold evening coat over satin dress, posing before decorative column, on stage in Schenley High School for annual Beauty Shop Owners fashion show
